::: Hell Beast glared at the crashed ship and ducked with Jackle. He turned 
to the small bot :::

::: Hell Beast ::: I dont know what these....Predacons want. We shall go in 
and settle this. Im a Senator...they wont hurt me.

::: Jackle ::: And what about me?!

::: Hell Beast ::: Consider yourself a myrter for the Predacon cause. Now get 
going!

::: Reluctantly they both head for this ship and wait outside the main 
entryway. :::

~~~~~~~~`

::: Set nods to Shuko's orders. Obviously he had been in these kind of 
situations before, where as Set had always been leading attacks from behinde 
a desk from across the galaxy. That didnt make him a coward, not in his eyes. 
There were many forms of courage. :::

::: He opened the ramp, and Hell Beast entered, followed by his minion :::

~~~~~~~~

::: At a small table, in the conference room, Set sat with Hell Beast and his 
little minion who seemed to be nervous. The light was dim because power was 
being re-routed to more important systems. :::

::: Hell Beast began, his large hands folded over his chain gun that rested 
on the table ::: Explain to me why you are here, now.

::: Set swallowed his pride..and fear. He knew Senator Hell Beast was an 
important figure, so important that his place was still reserved in the 
Senate. Set remembered that Hell Beast was mixed into organized crime and 
reciving bribes too. ::: We have come here to open a mining operation. We 
said we were arresting you to throw off the Maximals. I can assure you, you 
have nothing to worry about.
